alert.note: Alert for Decatur (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:56AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Decatur County through 515 AM CDT... At 455 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Jennings, or 9 miles east of Oberlin, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Decatur County, including the following locations... Kanona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
